'''Play Mechanix''' is an American {{w|arcade game}} entertainment company based in {{w|Skokie, Illinois}}, best known for the ''{{w|Big Buck Hunter}}'' series of arcade games. The company is responsible for developing ''[[Minecraft Dungeons Arcade]]'' alongside [[Mojang Studios]].

== Games developed ==

Play Mechanix has developed the following arcade games<ref>https://rawthrills.com/games/games-archive/</ref><ref>https://rawthrills.com/games/</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230928085748/https://rawthrills.com/tag/play-mechanix/|title=Tag: Play Mechanix|website=rawthrills.com|date=September 28, 2023}}</ref>:

* ''{{w|Big Buck Hunter}}'' (2000)
* ''{{w|Big Buck Hunter: Shooter's Challenge}}'' (2002)
* ''{{w|Big Buck Hunter II: Sportman's Paradise}}'' (2003)
* ''{{w|Johnny Nero: Action Hero}}'' (2004)
* ''{{w|Big Buck Hunter Pro}}'' (2005)
* ''{{w|Big Buck Hunter 2006: Call of the Wild}}'' (2006)
* ''{{w|Aliens: Extermination}}'' (2008)
* ''{{w|Big Buck Safari}}'' (2008)
* ''{{w|Wheel of Fortune}}'' (2009)
* ''{{w|Big Buck Hunter Pro: Open Season}}'' (2010)
* ''{{w|Terminator: Salvation}}'' (2010)
* ''{{w|Big Buck World}}'' (2010)
* ''{{w|Big Buck HD}}'' (2012)
* ''{{w|Aliens: Armageddon}}'' (2013)
* ''{{w|Barrel of Monkeys}}'' (2013)
* ''{{w|Big Buck HD Wild}}'' (2015)
* ''{{w|MotoGP}}'' (2015)
* ''{{w|Angry Birds Arcade}}'' (2016)
* ''{{w|The Walking Dead}}'' (2017)
* ''{{w|Halo: Fireteam Raven}}'' (2018)
* ''{{w|Big Buck Hunter: Reloaded}}'' (2019)
* ''{{w|Nitro Trucks}}'' (2020)
* ''[[Minecraft Dungeons Arcade]]'' (2021)
* ''{{w|MotoGP VR}}'' (2023)
* ''{{w|Angry Birds Boom!}}'' (2024)
* ''{{w|NBA Superstars}}'' (2024)

They have also developed the following video games:

* ''{{w|Big Buck Hunter: Arcade}}'' (PC/PS4/ONE/NSwitch, 2016-2017)
